roleset.name: active perception of flavor

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Ms. Morgan is really insulting all the troops who 've been there to assume that by going for ten days and taking a few casual leisurely trips outside the Green Zone that she got a full taste of combat

example.name: both args
example.text: Diminutive Vanderkitten Road Sprinter Starla Teddergreen pinned on the numbers for her first taste of mud racing

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on taste-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls see-30.1, stalk-35.3.
